data.eml:eml: A new Meteorus Haliday species from Colombia and Ecuador (Hymenoptera: Braconidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fernández, Helmuth Aguirre, Shaw, Scott R., Jones, Guinevere Z. (2010): A new Meteorus Haliday species from Colombia and Ecuador (Hymenoptera: Braconidae). Zootaxa 2453: 55-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.294196
